TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content: They get pre-release access to show people what the new update will encompass. Those builds are usually pretty buggy though
Oh. No wonder Patcher was taking so long.
Now I got .25! Now, re-open it!

Now I got .25! Now, re-open it!

So, the day after a major release, we start mass speculation about the next? Sounds like a noope.

This isn't strictly on-topic but I'm slowly pruning the Dev Links Compilation and I came across a link that points to a thread that I can't access.

That thread's been archived.

The post in question:

Place the object exactly where you want thrust to come out of, with the blue arrow facing the direction of the exhaust.

Here's an example image.
